alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Otsego, northwestern Delaware and southeastern Chenango Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morris to near Oxford. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Norwich, Sidney, Guilford, Oxford, Bainbridge, Masonville, Unadilla, New Lisbon and Otego. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 8 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
